member.name: T:RoboSharp.CommandErrorEventArgs
member.summary: Describes an error that occured when generating the command

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CommandErrorEventArgs.Error
member.summary: Error Description

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CommandErrorEventArgs.Exception
member.summary:
If this CommandErrorEventArgs object was created in response to an exception, that exception is captured here.
If no exception was thrown, this property will be null.

member.name: M:RoboSharp.CommandErrorEventArgs.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.param: Exception to data to pass to the event handler

member.name: T:RoboSharp.CopyOptions
member.summary: Source, Destination, and options for how to move or copy files.

member.name: F:RoboSharp.CopyOptions._source
member.summary: The source file path where the RoboCommand is copying files from.

member.name: F:RoboSharp.CopyOptions._destination
member.summary: The destination file path where the RoboCommand is copying files to.

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.FileFilter
member.summary: Allows you to supply a set of files to copy or use wildcard characters (* or ?).

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CopySubdirectories
member.summary: Copies subdirectories. Note that this option excludes empty directories. [/S]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CopySubdirectoriesIncludingEmpty
member.summary: Copies subdirectories. Note that this option includes empty directories. [/E]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.Depth
member.summary: Copies only the top N levels of the source directory tree. The default is zero which does not limit the depth. [/LEV:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.EnableRestartMode
member.summary: Copies files in Restart mode. [/Z]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.EnableBackupMode
member.summary: Copies files in Backup mode. [/B]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.EnableRestartModeWithBackupFallback
member.summary: Uses Restart mode. If access is denied, this option uses Backup mode. [/ZB]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.UseUnbufferedIo
member.summary: Copy using unbuffered I/O (recommended for large files). [/J]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.EnableEfsRawMode
member.summary: Copies all encrypted files in EFS RAW mode. [/EFSRAW]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CopyFlags
member.summary: This property should be set to a string consisting of all the flags to include (eg. DAT; DATSOU) Specifies the file properties to be copied. The following are the valid values for this option: D Data A Attributes T Time stamps S NTFS access control list (ACL) O Owner information U Auditing information The default value for copyflags is DAT (data, attributes, and time stamps). [/COPY:copyflags]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CopyFilesWithSecurity
member.summary: Copies files with security (equivalent to /copy:DAT). [/SEC]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CopyAll
member.summary: Copies all file information (equivalent to /copy:DATSOU). [/COPYALL]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.RemoveFileInformation
member.summary: Copies no file information (useful with Purge option). [/NOCOPY]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.FixFileSecurityOnAllFiles
member.summary: Fixes file security on all files, even skipped ones. [/SECFIX]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.FixFileTimesOnAllFiles
member.summary: Fixes file times on all files, even skipped ones. [/TIMFIX]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.Purge
member.summary: Deletes destination files and directories that no longer exist in the source. [/PURGE]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.Mirror
member.summary: Mirrors a directory tree (equivalent to CopySubdirectoriesIncludingEmpty plus Purge). [/MIR]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.MoveFiles
member.summary: Moves files, and deletes them from the source after they are copied. [/MOV]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.MoveFilesAndDirectories
member.summary: Moves files and directories, and deletes them from the source after they are copied. [/MOVE]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.AddAttributes
member.summary: This property should be set to a string consisting of all the attributes to add (eg. AH; RASHCNET). Adds the specified attributes to copied files. [/A+:attributes]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.RemoveAttributes
member.summary: This property should be set to a string consisting of all the attributes to remove (eg. AH; RASHCNET). Removes the specified attributes from copied files. [/A-:attributes]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CreateDirectoryAndFileTree
member.summary: Creates a directory tree and zero-length files only. [/CREATE]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.FatFiles
member.summary: Creates destination files by using 8.3 character-length FAT file names only. [/FAT]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.TurnLongPathSupportOff
member.summary: Turns off support for very long paths (longer than 256 characters). [/256]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.MonitorSourceChangesLimit
member.summary: The default value of zero indicates that you do not wish to monitor for changes. Monitors the source, and runs again when more than N changes are detected. [/MON:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.MonitorSourceTimeLimit
member.summary: The default value of zero indicates that you do not wish to monitor for changes. Monitors source, and runs again in M minutes if changes are detected. [/MOT:M]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.RunHours
member.summary: Specifies run times when new copies may be started. [/rh:hhmm-hhmm]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CheckPerFile
member.summary: Checks run times on a per-file (not per-pass) basis. [/PF]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.InterPacketGap
member.summary: The default value of zero indicates that this feature is turned off. Specifies the inter-packet gap to free bandwidth on slow lines. [/IPG:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.CopySymbolicLink
member.summary: Copies the symbolic link instead of the target. [/SL]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.MultiThreadedCopiesCount
member.summary: The default value of zero indicates that this feature is turned off. Creates multi-threaded copies with N threads. Must be an integer between 1 and 128. The MultiThreadedCopiesCount parameter cannot be used with the /IPG and EnableEfsRawMode parameters. [/MT:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.DirectoryCopyFlags
member.summary: What to copy for directories (default is DA). (copyflags: D=Data, A=Attributes, T=Timestamps). [/DCOPY:copyflags]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.DoNotCopyDirectoryInfo
member.summary: Do not copy any directory info. [/NODCOPY]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyOptions.DoNotUseWindowsCopyOffload
member.summary: Copy files without using the Windows Copy Offload mechanism. [/NOOFFLOAD]

member.name: T:RoboSharp.CopyProgressEventArgs
member.summary: Current File Progress reported as

member.name: P:RoboSharp.CopyProgressEventArgs.CurrentFileProgress
member.summary: Current File Progress Percentage

member.name: T:RoboSharp.ErrorEventArgs
member.summary: Information about an Error reported by the RoboCopy process

member.name: P:RoboSharp.ErrorEventArgs.Error
member.summary: Error Description

member.name: P:RoboSharp.ErrorEventArgs.ErrorCode
member.summary: Error Code

member.name: T:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions
member.summary: Options related to the output logs generated by RoboCopy

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.ListOnly
member.summary: Do not copy, timestamp or delete any files. [/L]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.ReportExtraFiles
member.summary: Report all extra files, not just those selected. [X]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.VerboseOutput
member.summary: Produce verbose output, showing skipped files. [V]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.IncludeSourceTimeStamps
member.summary: Include source file time stamps in the output. [/TS]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.IncludeFullPathNames
member.summary: Include full path names of files in the output. [/FP]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.PrintSizesAsBytes
member.summary: Print sizes as bytes in the output. [/BYTES]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.NoFileSizes
member.summary: Do not log file sizes. [/NS]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.NoFileClasses
member.summary: Do not log file classes. [/NC]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.NoFileList
member.summary: Do not log file names. [/NFL] WARNING: If this is set to TRUE then GUI cannot handle showing progress correctly as it can't get information it requires from the log

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.NoDirectoryList
member.summary: Do not log directory names. [/NDL]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.NoProgress
member.summary: Do not log percentage copied. [/NP]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.ShowEstimatedTimeOfArrival
member.summary: Show estimated time of arrival of copied files. [/ETA]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.LogPath
member.summary: Output status to LOG file (overwrite existing log). [/LOG:file]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.AppendLogPath
member.summary: Output status to LOG file (append to existing log). [/LOG+:file]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.UnicodeLogPath
member.summary: Output status to LOG file as UNICODE (overwrite existing log). [/UNILOG:file]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.AppendUnicodeLogPath
member.summary: Output status to LOG file as UNICODE (append to existing log). [/UNILOG+:file]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.OutputToRoboSharpAndLog
member.summary: Output to RoboSharp and Log. [/TEE]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.NoJobHeader
member.summary: Do not output a Job Header. [/NJH]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.NoJobSummary
member.summary: Do not output a Job Summary. [/NJS] WARNING: If this is set to TRUE then statistics will not work correctly as this information is gathered from the job summary part of the log

member.name: P:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.OutputAsUnicode
member.summary: Output as UNICODE. [/UNICODE]

member.name: M:RoboSharp.LoggingOptions.WrapPath(System.String)
member.summary: Encase the LogPath in quotes if needed

member.name: T:RoboSharp.FileClassType
member.summary: Message Type reported by RoboCopy

member.name: F:RoboSharp.FileClassType.NewDir
member.summary: Details about a FOLDER

member.name: F:RoboSharp.FileClassType.File
member.summary: Details about a FILE

member.name: F:RoboSharp.FileClassType.SystemMessage
member.summary: Status Message reported by RoboCopy

member.name: T:RoboSharp.ProcessedFileInfo
member.summary: Contains information about the current item being processed by RoboCopy

member.name: P:RoboSharp.ProcessedFileInfo.FileClass
member.summary: Description of the item as reported by RoboCopy

member.name: P:RoboSharp.ProcessedFileInfo.Size
member.summary: File Size

member.name: P:RoboSharp.ProcessedFileInfo.Name
member.summary: Folder or File Name / Message Text

member.name: T:RoboSharp.Results.ResultsBuilder
member.summary: Helper class to build a object.

member.name: T:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyExitCodes
member.summary: RoboCopy Exit Codes

member.name: F:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyExitCodes.NoErrorNoCopy
member.summary: No Files Copied, No Errors Occured

member.name: F:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyExitCodes.FilesCopiedSuccessful
member.summary: One or more files were copied successfully

member.name: F:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyExitCodes.ExtraFilesOrDirectoriesDetected
member.summary:
Some Extra files or directories were detected.
Examine the output log for details.

member.name: F:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyExitCodes.MismatchedDirectoriesDetected
member.summary:
Some Mismatched files or directories were detected.
Examine the output log. Housekeeping might be required.

member.name: F:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyExitCodes.SomeFilesOrDirectoriesCouldNotBeCopied
member.summary:
Some files or directories could not be copied
(copy errors occurred and the retry limit was exceeded). Check these errors further.

member.name: F:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyExitCodes.SeriousErrorOccoured
member.summary:
Serious error. Robocopy did not copy any files.
Either a usage error or an error due to insufficient access privileges on the source or destination directorie

member.name: T:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyResults
member.summary: Results provided by the RoboCopy command. Includes the Log, Exit Code, and statistics parsed from the log.

member.summary: Information about number of Directories Copied, Skipped, Failed, etc.

member.summary: Information about number of Files Copied, Skipped, Failed, etc.

member.name: P:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyResults.BytesStatistic
member.summary: Information about number of Bytes processed.

member.name: P:RoboSharp.Results.RoboCopyResults.LogLines
member.summary: Output Text reported by RoboCopy

member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.summary: Object that evaluates the ExitCode reported after RoboCopy finishes executing.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: ExitCode as reported by RoboCopy

member.summary: ExitCode reported by RoboCopy converted into the Enum

member.summary: Average Transfer Rate in Bytes/Second

member.summary: Average Transfer Rate in MB/Minute

member.name: T:RoboSharp.Results.Statistic
member.summary: Information about number of items Copied, Skipped, Failed, etc.

member.summary: Total Scanned during the run

member.name: P:RoboSharp.Results.Statistic.Copied
member.summary: Total Copied

member.name: P:RoboSharp.Results.Statistic.Skipped
member.summary: Total Skipped

member.name: P:RoboSharp.Results.Statistic.Failed
member.summary: Total that failed to copy or move

member.name: P:RoboSharp.Results.Statistic.Extras
member.summary: Total Extra that exist in the Destination (but are missing from the Source)

member.summary: Parse a string and for the tokens reported by RoboCopy

member.summary: Add the results of the supplied Statistics object to this Statistics object.

member.summary: Add the results of the supplied Statistics objects to this Statistics object.

member.summary: Combine the results of the supplied statistics objects

member.summary: Combine the supplied objects, then get the average.

member.name: T:RoboSharp.RetryOptions
member.summary: RoboCopy switches for how to react if a copy/move operation errors

member.name: P:RoboSharp.RetryOptions.RetryCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of retries N on failed copies (default is 0). [/R:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.RetryOptions.RetryWaitTime
member.summary: Specifies the wait time N in seconds between retries (default is 30). [/W:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.RetryOptions.SaveToRegistry
member.summary: Saves RetryCount and RetryWaitTime in the Registry as default settings. [/REG]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.RetryOptions.WaitForSharenames
member.summary: Wait for sharenames to be defined. [/TBD]

member.name: T:RoboSharp.RoboCommand
member.summary: Wrapper for the RoboCopy process

member.summary: Value indicating if process is currently paused

member.summary: Value indicating if process is currently running

member.name: P:RoboSharp.RoboCommand.IsCancelled
member.summary: Value indicating if process was Cancelled

member.name: P:RoboSharp.RoboCommand.StopIfDisposing
member.summary:
Value indicating if the process should be killed when the method is called.
For example, if the RoboCopy process should exit when the program exits, this should be set to TRUE.

member.name: T:RoboSharp.RoboSharpConfiguration
member.summary: Setup the ErrorToken and the path to RoboCopy.exe.

member.name: P:RoboSharp.RoboSharpConfiguration.RoboCopyExe
member.summary: Specify the path to RoboCopy.exe here. If not set, use the default copy.

member.name: T:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions
member.summary: RoboCopy Switches that determine which folders and files are selected for copying/moving

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.OnlyCopyArchiveFiles
member.summary: Copies only files for which the Archive attribute is set. [/A]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.OnlyCopyArchiveFilesAndResetArchiveFlag
member.summary: Copies only files for which the Archive attribute is set, and resets the Archive attribute. [/M]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.IncludeAttributes
member.summary: This property should be set to a string consisting of all the attributes to include (eg. AH; RASHCNETO). Includes only files for which any of the specified attributes are set. [/IA:attributes]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeAttributes
member.summary: This property should be set to a string consisting of all the attributes to exclude (eg. AH; RASHCNETO). Excludes files for which any of the specified attributes are set. [/XA:attributes]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeFiles
member.summary: Files should be separated by spaces. Excludes files that match the specified names or paths. Note that FileName can include wildcard characters (* and ?). [/XF File File ...]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeDirectories
member.summary: Directories should be separated by spaces. Excludes directories that match the specified names or paths. [/XD Directory Directory ...]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeChanged
member.summary: Excludes changed files. [/XC]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeNewer
member.summary: Excludes newer files. [/XN]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeOlder
member.summary: Excludes older files. [/XO]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeExtra
member.summary: Excludes extra files and directories. [/XX]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeLonely
member.summary: Excludes lonely files and directories. [/XL]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.IncludeSame
member.summary: Includes the same files. [/IS]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.IncludeTweaked
member.summary: Includes tweaked files. [/IT]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.MaxFileSize
member.summary: Zero indicates that this feature is turned off. Specifies the maximum file size (to exclude files bigger than N bytes). [/MAX:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.MinFileSize
member.summary: Zero indicates that this feature is turned off. Specifies the minimum file size (to exclude files smaller than N bytes). [/MIN:N]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.MaxFileAge
member.summary: Specifies the maximum file age (to exclude files older than N days or date). [/MAXAGE:N OR YYYYMMDD]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.MinFileAge
member.summary: Specifies the minimum file age (exclude files newer than N days or date). [/MINAGE:N OR YYYYMMDD]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.MaxLastAccessDate
member.summary: Specifies the maximum last access date (excludes files unused since Date). [/MAXLAD:YYYYMMDD]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.MinLastAccessDate
member.summary: Specifies the minimum last access date (excludes files used since N) If N is less than 1900, N specifies the number of days. Otherwise, N specifies a date in the format YYYYMMDD. [/MAXLAD:N or YYYYMMDD]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeJunctionPoints
member.summary: Excludes junction points, which are normally included by default. [/XJ]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.UseFatFileTimes
member.summary: Assumes FAT file times (two-second precision). [/FFT]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.CompensateForDstDifference
member.summary: Compensates for one-hour DST time differences. [/DST]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeJunctionPointsForDirectories
member.summary: Excludes junction points for directories. [/XJD]

member.name: P:RoboSharp.SelectionOptions.ExcludeJunctionPointsForFiles
member.summary: Excludes junction points for files. [/XJF]

member.name: M:RoboSharp.VersionManager.RtlGetVersion(RoboSharp.VersionManager.OSVERSIONINFOEX@)
member.summary: taken from https://stackoverflow.com/a/49641055
